title: Total Recall
description: Alright, so Chloe knew it was just a little crazy to have a crush on a sexdroid, be he ever so cute and great in the sack, but she did, and she wasn’t about to let the company ‘disassemble’ him, by god, even if she did have to rob the ranger station to rescue him! Jared and Kane didn’t think she needed the fucking fuck droid, not when they had the same gods damned programming and were ready and more than willing to practice their own pleasure droid programming on her! But Chloe Armstein wasn’t an easy woman to dissuade when she set her mind to something.Rating: Carnal/Erotica—graphic violence and sexual encounters, multiple sexual partners, ménage of four.Genre: Futuristic Romance.
author: Kaitlyn O'Connor
